metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19343 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Undertow when using Remoting as shipped in Red Hat Jboss EAP before version 7.2.4. A memory leak in HttpOpenListener due to holding remote connections indefinitely may lead to denial of service. Versions before undertow 2.0.25.SP1 and jboss-remoting 5.0.14.SP1 are believed to be vulnerable.

criterions.comment: undertow package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
